nodes.text: Equator City was a major city and former capital city of Rodia located on the equator.

It had a gambling complex operated by the part of the cartel that was dedicated to money laundering, controlled by Black Sun. The Flip of the Credit casino was also based there. The city was also home to the prestigious concert hall known as the Holosseum in which holostar Javul Charn performed in 2 BBY.
